title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.2 - Length of release
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.2 - Length of release

State Regulations

School authorities may release individual pupils for a
period not to exceed 30 days in any one school year, provided, however, that no
pupil shall be released for more than 20 days in any three-month
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
192.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
